pages.text: Welcome to Mine and Slash, a mod that completely changes how minecraft gear progression and combat works! $(br)If you like games like Diablo or Path of Exile and that sweet taste of epic loot, you'll be right at home!

Some pointers first, mobs are now much tougher, especially if you run far from spawn. Do not do that at the start! Do make a home and slowly increase your level and attain gear so that you can adventure further.
Your first priority should be finding diamonds, iron and gold. $(br)Check the craftables part of the book to see a player level up token crafting recipe. You'll need that to advance.

After you get a few level ups and some good gear, you should be ready to explore the world a bit, or maybe even the nether or other dimensions! $(br) At the start it's tough to fight higher leveled mobs, but as you advance the difference becomes less noticable.
This is just the introduction, read the other parts of the book for full info.
